name: Localgiving
description: Localgiving has helped over 7,000 charities across the UK to raise nearly £30 million through its online fundraising platform, including £3.5m in match funding and £1m in grants from our parent charity, the Localgiving Foundation. Over 350,000 individuals across the UK have used our platform to support a charity.

jobs.title: Marketing and Product Manager
jobs.description:
We are seeking a highly motivated individual to join our small, dynamic team and lead our marketing and product development activities. The successful candidate will be an expert at using data to apply creative solutions to enable us to achieve our goals. They will be responsible for leading our marketing activities that enable us to grow and scale our organisation, whilst working across departments to manage the development of new products for our customers and lead the process to bring them to the market.

Our offer

We have a passion for helping charities to utilise technology to increase the donations and awareness they raise; enabling them to have a greater impact on the communities they serve.

We are a growing social enterprise, based in Shoreditch. Every day you will be making a difference to the thousands of local charities that use our services and you’ll be doing it with some excellent people (including our customers). Things will move fast and you’ll have the opportunity to implement improvements regularly. The role is an excellent opportunity for someone looking for a role where they can continue developing their skill-set whilst making a massive difference to charities and communities across the UK.


Responsibilities:

- Develop and deliver the marketing and communications strategy

- Build, execute and deliver digital marketing campaigns focused on demand generation and brand awareness

- Create, analyse and report on email marketing communications

- Manage content for website and analyse website traffic and sales data

- Manage the development of new technical products and work with the 
Business Development Team to bring these to the market

- Lead the launch and development of content for key programmes and fundraising campaigns

- Represent the Marketing and Product functions at Management Level


What we are looking for:

- A minimum of three years of experience within a marketing role

- An excellent communicator that writes brilliant copy

- Strong understanding of the digital landscape and online marketing principles with proven online growth success

- Experience of working with CRM systems, preferably Salesforce, and ability to pick up new technologies quickly

- Experience of working with email marketing software, preferably Mailchimp

- Experience of working with a CMS and a good understanding of HTML and CSS

- Experience of working in both B2B and B2C settings, preferably in an e-commerce environment

- Experience of product management would be preferable; however, experience of project management, along with evidence of a strong attention to detail and organisational skills would be sufficient

- Ability to analyse, interpret and use data to improve processes and results

- An eye for design and experience using Photoshop 

- Strong attention to detail and organisational skills

- High-level of flexibility and self-motivation, with a genuine desire to make a difference and positive impact in local communities

jobs.title: Front-end Web Developer
jobs.description:
**About Localgiving**

Localgiving is a growing social enterprise, based in Shoreditch. Every day you will be making a difference to the thousands of local charities that use our platform and services and you’ll be doing it with some excellent people (including our customers). 

Things will move fast and you’ll have the opportunity to implement improvements regularly. The role is an excellent opportunity for someone looking for a role where they can continue developing their skill-set whilst making a massive difference to charities and communities across the UK.

**About the Team**

We are a small, close knit team full of highly motivated developers. We are not afraid to voice opinions and offer critique, it only makes us better. You’ll be part of an environment where good ideas and improvements can be pushed to Production very quickly. 

**Your Mission at Localgiving**

As a Front-end Developer at Localgiving, you'll be taking ownership of front facing side of Localgiving platform. Whether it's writing and improving our Javascript or optimising the UX/UI, you'll be involved in making the platform easier to use for both donors and charities, raising more money for great causes!

**Your main responsibilities will be:**

* Taking ownership of Localgiving front-end
* Write and maintain HTML, CSS and Javascript across the platform, making sure it's tested and optimised
* Design and optimise User Interfaces both for desktop and mobile
* Look after User Experience, make it easier for users to use the platform
* Share your ideas and critique with the team, your feedback is important!

**Skills we are looking for:**

* Modern HTML, CSS and Javascript
* jQuery
* UX/UI design experience
* Mobile first and responsive design experience
* Git

**Would be nice to have:**

* Knowledge of PHP or any other Object Oriented language
* Experience working with Twig or any other templating engines 
* Some experience working with Javascript frameworks: React, Angular or Vue and are ready to help us to implement them where needed
* You worked within an Agile environment, fortnightly Sprints is how we get things done.
* You are familiar with front-end unit testing frameworks like Jest
* Be at ease using command line tools
* Symfony 5 is our primary framework, experience with 3.4 or later versions would be of an advantage
* We use AWS Aurora as a database engine, knowledge of SQL and Doctrine ORM would be great.

**Our Stack**
* PHP
* Symfony 5
* Twig
* Ubuntu
* Docker
* AWS
